mapper.select:
select id,pid,bill_id,source_bill_id,prov_id,prov_name,prov_code,goods_id,goods_name,goods_gg,mfrs_id,made,packet_code,batch_code,sterilization_date,sterilization_code,sterilization_end_date,expdt_end_date,unit,exc_qty,exc_packet_qty,master_code,sec_code,unique_kind,last_update_datetime,version from returned_goods_list
prov_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{provName},'%')
and goods_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{goodsName},'%')
mapper.update:
update returned_goods_list
pid = #{pid},
bill_id = #{billId},
source_bill_id = #{sourceBillId},
prov_id = #{provId},
prov_name = #{provName},
prov_code = #{provCode},
goods_id = #{goodsId},
goods_name = #{goodsName},
goods_gg = #{goodsGg},
mfrs_id = #{mfrsId},
made = #{made},
packet_code = #{packetCode},
batch_code = #{batchCode},
sterilization_date = #{sterilizationDate},
sterilization_code = #{sterilizationCode},
sterilization_end_date = #{sterilizationEndDate},
expdt_end_date = #{expdtEndDate},
unit = #{unit},
exc_qty = #{excQty},
exc_packet_qty = #{excPacketQty},
master_code = #{masterCode},
sec_code = #{secCode},
unique_kind = #{uniqueKind},
last_update_datetime = sysdate(),
last_update_datetime = sysdate,
version=version+1,
and id = #{id} and version= #{version}
mapper.insert: insert into returned_goods_list ( id , pid , bill_id , source_bill_id , prov_id , prov_name , prov_code , goods_id , goods_name , goods_gg , mfrs_id , made , packet_code , batch_code , sterilization_date , sterilization_code , sterilization_end_date , expdt_end_date , unit , exc_qty , exc_packet_qty , master_code , sec_code , unique_kind , last_update_datetime , version ) values (#{id},#{pid},#{billId},#{sourceBillId},#{provId},#{provName},#{provCode},#{goodsId},#{goodsName},#{goodsGg},#{mfrsId},#{made},#{packetCode},#{batchCode},#{sterilizationDate},#{sterilizationCode},#{sterilizationEndDate},#{expdtEndDate},#{unit},#{excQty},#{excPacketQty},#{masterCode},#{secCode},#{uniqueKind},#{lastUpdateDatetime},#{version})
